program: Master of Engineering (MEng) – Thayer School of Engineering

sections.text: The MEng provides advanced professional training in engineering with a focus on coursework rather than research.

items: Capstone project encouraged but not required
sections.text: The MEng emphasizes coursework and practical application over research.

items: Bachelor’s degree in engineering or closely related STEM field
sections.text: Applicants must hold an undergraduate degree in engineering or related sciences and demonstrate quantitative preparation.
Graduates enter advanced technical roles in engineering firms, product design, and applied technology.
